00107 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 BOOL CLogViewerDlg::OnInitDialog()
00109 {
00110     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00111 
00112     if( mOpenOtherLog )
00113     {
00114         mOpenOtherLog = FALSE;
00115         OnBnClickedViewOther();
00116     }
00117     else
00118     {
00119         mLogParser->init( CString( Logger::LOG_FILE ) );
00120         resetView();
00121         UpdateLogDisplay();
00122     }
00123     UpdateData( FALSE );
00124     SetWindowPos( NULL, 500, 350, 0, 0, SWP_NOZORDER );
00125     return TRUE;
00126 }    /* OnInitDialog() */

00139 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 void CLogViewerDlg::UpdateLogDisplay()
00145 {
00146     BOOL scroll = FALSE;
00147     int maxScroll;
00148     int scrolledTo;
00149 
00150     scrolledTo = mPacketListBox.GetScrollPos( SB_VERT );
00151     maxScroll = mPacketListBox.GetScrollLimit( SB_VERT );
00152 
00153     if( scrolledTo == maxScroll )
00154     {
00155         scroll = TRUE;
00156     }
00157 
00158     if( updateView() && scroll )
00159     {
00160         mPacketListBox.SetTopIndex( mPacketListBox.GetCount() - 1 );
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00168 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 BOOL CLogViewerDlg::updateView()
00170 {
00171     UpdateData( TRUE );
00172 
00173     mLogParser->readLog();
00174     while( mPacketListBox.GetCount() < mLogParser->getLineCount() )
00175     {
00176         mPacketListBox.AddString( mLogParser->getPacketTitle( mPacketListBox.GetCount() ) );
00177     }
00178 
00179     UpdateData( FALSE );
00180 
00181     return TRUE;
00182 }

00232 void CLogViewerDlg::OnSize
00233     (
00234     UINT aType,
00235     int  aClientWidth,
00236     int  aClientHeight
00237     )
00238 {
00239     CDialog::OnSize( aType, aClientWidth, aClientHeight );
00240 
00241     //check to make sure dialog is initialized...
00242     //only need to check one field
00243     if( mPacketListTitleLabel.GetSafeHwnd() != NULL )
00244     {
00245         UpdateData( FALSE );
00246         //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00247         //move the search group box
00248         CRect searchGroupRect;
00249         mSearchGroupBox.GetClientRect( &searchGroupRect );
00250         searchGroupRect.MoveToX( EDGE_SPACING );
00251         searchGroupRect.MoveToY( aClientHeight - searchGroupRect.Height() - EDGE_SPACING );
00252         mSearchGroupBox.MoveWindow( searchGroupRect );
00253 
00254         //move radio buttons
00255         CRect upRadioRect;
00256         mSearchUpRadioButton.GetClientRect( &upRadioRect );
00257         upRadioRect.MoveToX( searchGroupRect.CenterPoint().x - upRadioRect.Width() - 2 );
00258         upRadioRect.MoveToY( searchGroupRect.top + 10 );
00259         mSearchUpRadioButton.MoveWindow( upRadioRect );
00260 
00261         CRect downRadioRect;
00262         mSearchDownRadioButton.GetClientRect( &downRadioRect );
00263         downRadioRect.MoveToX( searchGroupRect.CenterPoint().x + 2 );
00264         downRadioRect.MoveToY( upRadioRect.top );
00265         mSearchDownRadioButton.MoveWindow( downRadioRect );
00266 
00267         //move edit box
00268         CRect findEditRect;
00269         mSearchTextControl.GetWindowRect( &findEditRect );
00270         findEditRect.MoveToX( searchGroupRect.left + EDGE_SPACING );
00271         findEditRect.MoveToY( upRadioRect.bottom + 2 );
00272         mSearchTextControl.MoveWindow( findEditRect );
00273 
00274         //move 'find next' button
00275         CRect findNextRect;
00276         mFindNextButton.GetWindowRect( &findNextRect );
00277         findNextRect.MoveToXY( findEditRect.right + EDGE_SPACING, findEditRect.top );
00278         mFindNextButton.MoveWindow( findNextRect );
00279 
00280         //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00281         //resize the packet list
00282         CRect packetListTitleRect;
00283         mPacketListTitleLabel.GetWindowRect( &packetListTitleRect );
00284         packetListTitleRect.MoveToXY( EDGE_SPACING, EDGE_SPACING );
00285         mPacketListTitleLabel.MoveWindow( packetListTitleRect );
00286 
00287         CRect packetListRect;
00288         mPacketListBox.GetWindowRect( &packetListRect );
00289         packetListRect.MoveToXY( EDGE_SPACING, packetListTitleRect.bottom + 2 );
00290         packetListRect.bottom = searchGroupRect.top - 15;       // consume available height
00291         mPacketListBox.MoveWindow( packetListRect );
00292 
00293         //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00294         //move the "Viewing:" text to be bottom-aligned with the list box
00295         CRect logNameTitleRect;
00296         mLogNameTitleLabel.GetWindowRect( &logNameTitleRect );
00297         logNameTitleRect.MoveToXY
00298             (
00299             packetListRect.right + 15,
00300             packetListRect.bottom - logNameTitleRect.Height()
00301             );
00302         mLogNameTitleLabel.MoveWindow( logNameTitleRect );
00303 
00304         CRect logNameRect;
00305         mLogNameControl.GetWindowRect( &logNameRect );
00306         logNameRect.MoveToXY( logNameTitleRect.right + 4, logNameTitleRect.top );
00307         logNameRect.right = aClientWidth - EDGE_SPACING;                             // consume available space
00308         mLogNameControl.MoveWindow( logNameRect );
00309 
00310         //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00311         //move the text above the packet information window
00312         //resize and move the packet information window
00313         CRect currentPacketTitleRect;
00314         mCurrentPacketTitleLabel.GetWindowRect( &currentPacketTitleRect );
00315         currentPacketTitleRect.MoveToXY( packetListRect.right + 15, EDGE_SPACING );
00316         mCurrentPacketTitleLabel.MoveWindow( currentPacketTitleRect );
00317 
00318         CRect currentPacketRect;
00319         mCurrentPacketControl.GetWindowRect( &currentPacketRect );
00320         currentPacketRect.MoveToXY( currentPacketTitleRect.left, packetListRect.top );
00321         currentPacketRect.right = aClientWidth - EDGE_SPACING;
00322         currentPacketRect.bottom = logNameRect.top - EDGE_SPACING;
00323         mCurrentPacketControl.MoveWindow( currentPacketRect );
00324 
00325         mLogParser->setRenderWidth( currentPacketRect.Width() );
00326 
00327         //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00328         // move the buttons; these are in a 3x2 grid with half-button-width
00329         // padding on each side, and equal spacing
00330         CRect buttonGroupRect;
00331         buttonGroupRect.SetRect( currentPacketRect.left, searchGroupRect.top, aClientWidth - EDGE_SPACING, aClientHeight - EDGE_SPACING );
00332 
00333         CRect buttonRect;
00334         mCloseButton.GetWindowRect( &buttonRect );
00335         int buttonSpacing = ( buttonGroupRect.Width() - 4 * buttonRect.Width() ) / 4;
00336 
00337         buttonRect.MoveToXY
00338             (
00339             buttonGroupRect.CenterPoint().x - 3 * buttonRect.Width() / 2 - buttonSpacing,
00340             buttonGroupRect.top
00341             );
00342         mResendButton.MoveWindow( buttonRect );
00343 
00344         buttonRect.MoveToXY
00345             (
00346             buttonGroupRect.CenterPoint().x - buttonRect.Width() / 2,
00347             buttonGroupRect.top
00348             );
00349         mClearButton.MoveWindow( buttonRect );
00350 
00351         buttonRect.MoveToXY
00352             (
00353             buttonGroupRect.CenterPoint().x + buttonRect.Width() / 2  + buttonSpacing,
00354             buttonGroupRect.top
00355             );
00356         mSaveButton.MoveWindow( buttonRect );
00357 
00358         buttonRect.MoveToXY
00359             (
00360             buttonGroupRect.CenterPoint().x - 3 * buttonRect.Width() / 2 - buttonSpacing,
00361             buttonGroupRect.bottom - buttonRect.Height()
00362             );
00363         mViewOtherButton.MoveWindow( buttonRect );
00364 
00365         buttonRect.MoveToXY
00366             (
00367             buttonGroupRect.CenterPoint().x - buttonRect.Width() / 2,
00368             buttonGroupRect.bottom - buttonRect.Height()
00369             );
00370         mViewCurrentButton.MoveWindow( buttonRect );
00371 
00372         buttonRect.MoveToXY
00373             (
00374             buttonGroupRect.CenterPoint().x + buttonRect.Width() / 2  + buttonSpacing,
00375             buttonGroupRect.bottom - buttonRect.Height()
00376             );
00377         mCloseButton.MoveWindow( buttonRect );
00378 
00379         OnLbnSelchangeLog();    //packet window needs to be reformatted
00380 
00381         this->RedrawWindow();
00382     }
00383 }

00405 void CLogViewerDlg::resendPacket()
00406 {

00411 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00416 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00417 void CLogViewerDlg::OnLbnSelchangeLog()
00418 {
00419     UpdateData( TRUE );
00420 
00421     int selectedIndex = mPacketListBox.GetCurSel();
00422     if( selectedIndex >= 0 && selectedIndex < mPacketListBox.GetCount() )
00423     {
00424         mSelectedPacketText = mLogParser->getPacketDetail( selectedIndex );
00425         if( SerialPort::getInstance()->isOpen() )
00426         {
00427             mResendButton.EnableWindow( TRUE );
00428         }
00429     }
00430 
00431     UpdateData( FALSE );
00432 }
00433 
00434 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00438 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00439 void CLogViewerDlg::OnBnClickedViewOther()
00440 {
00441     TCHAR workingDirectory[200];
00442     // opening a file in another directory changes the current
00443     // directory, which will cause problems because the log and data
00444     // files are opened relative to the current directory.  So, get the
00445     // directory now so that it can be restored when the user is done
00446     // picking a file.
00447     DWORD returnValue = GetCurrentDirectory( 200, workingDirectory );
00448     if( returnValue == 0 || returnValue > 200 )
00449     {
00450         MessageBox( _T("Unable to get current directory"), _T("Severe Error") );
00451         OnCancel();
00452         return;
00453     }
00454     CFileDialog dlg
00455         (
00456         TRUE,
00457         _T("log"),
00458         NULL,
00459         OFN_HIDEREADONLY | OFN_OVERWRITEPROMPT,
00460         _T("Log Files (*.log)|*.log||")
00461         );
00462     if( dlg.DoModal() == IDOK )
00463     {
00464         mLogParser->init( dlg.GetPathName() );
00465 
00466         resetView();
00467         UpdateLogDisplay();
00468     }
00469     SetCurrentDirectory( workingDirectory );
00470 
00471 }    /* OnBnClickedViewOther */
00472 
00473 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00477 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00478 void CLogViewerDlg::resetView()
00479 {
00480     UpdateData( TRUE );
00481     mPacketListBox.ResetContent();
00482     mPacketListBox.SetTopIndex( mPacketListBox.GetCount() - 1 );
00483 
00484     mSelectedPacketText = _T("");
00485     if( mLogParser->getFilename() == Logger::LOG_FILE )
00486     {
00487         mLogNameText.Format( _T(" Current Execution's Packet Log") );
00488         mLogNameControl.SetWindowText( mLogNameText );
00489         mClearButton.EnableWindow( TRUE );
00490     }
00491     else
00492     {
00493         mLogNameText.Format( _T(" %s"), mLogParser->getFilename() );
00494         mLogNameControl.SetWindowText( mLogNameText );
00495         mClearButton.EnableWindow( FALSE );
00496     }
00497 
00498     mResendButton.EnableWindow( FALSE );
00499     UpdateData( FALSE );
00500 }

00502 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00506 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00507 void CLogViewerDlg::OnBnClickedViewCurrent()
00508 {
00509     if( mLogParser->getFilename() == Logger::LOG_FILE )
00510     {
00511         return; //already viewing current log
00512     }
00513 
00514     mLogParser->init( CString( Logger::LOG_FILE ) );
00515 
00516     resetView();
00517     UpdateLogDisplay();
00518 }    /* OnBnClickedViewCurrent */

00524 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00525 void CLogViewerDlg::OnBnClickedClearLog()
00526 {
00527     Logger::clearLog();
00528     mLogParser->init( CString( Logger::LOG_FILE ) );
00529 
00530     resetView();
00531 }

00533 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00537 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00538 void CLogViewerDlg::OnBnClickedSaveAs()
00539 {
00540     int filenameLength = WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, mLogParser->getFilename(), -1, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL );
00541     char *filenameAnsi = new char[filenameLength];
00542     WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, mLogParser->getFilename(), -1, filenameAnsi, filenameLength, NULL, NULL );
00543     ifstream logFile( filenameAnsi, ios_base::in );
00544     delete filenameAnsi;
00545 
00546     if( logFile.good() )
00547     {
00548         //log is open..request mSaveButton file and mSaveButton
00549         TCHAR workingDirectory[200];
00550 
00551         // opening a file in another directory changes the current
00552         // directory, which will cause problems because the log and data
00553         // files are opened relative to the current directory.  So, get the
00554         // directory now so that it can be restored when the user is done
00555         // picking a file.
00556         DWORD returnValue = GetCurrentDirectory( 200, workingDirectory );
00557         if( returnValue == 0 || returnValue > 200 )
00558         {
00559             MessageBox( _T("Unable to get current directory"), _T("Severe Error") );
00560             OnCancel();
00561             return;
00562         }
00563 
00564         CFileDialog dlg
00565             (
00566             FALSE,
00567             _T("log"),
00568             NULL,
00569             OFN_HIDEREADONLY | OFN_OVERWRITEPROMPT,
00570             _T("Log Files (*.log)|*.log||")
00571             );
00572 
00573         if( dlg.DoModal() == IDOK && dlg.GetFileName() != mLogParser->getFilename() )
00574         {
00575             std::string line;
00576 
00577             int filenameLength = WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, dlg.GetPathName(), -1, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL );
00578             char *filename = new char[filenameLength];
00579             WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, dlg.GetPathName().GetBuffer(), -1, filename, filenameLength, NULL, NULL );
00580             ofstream destinationFile( filename, ios_base::out );
00581             delete filename;
00582             if( destinationFile.good() )
00583             {
00584                 logFile.peek();
00585                 while( !logFile.eof() )
00586                 {
00587                     getline( logFile, line );
00588                     destinationFile << line << endl;
00589                 }
00590             }
00591             destinationFile.close();
00592         }
00593         SetCurrentDirectory( workingDirectory );    //change back (see above)
00594     }
00595     logFile.close();
00596 }
00597 
00598 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00603 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00604 void CLogViewerDlg::OnBnClickedFindNext()
00605 {
00606     UpdateData( TRUE );
00607 
00608     if( mPacketListBox.GetCount() == 0 )
00609     {
00610         return;         // nothing to search, so exit
00611     }
00612 
00613     int selectedIndex = mPacketListBox.GetCurSel();
00614     if( selectedIndex < 0 )
00615     {
00616         selectedIndex = 0;
00617     }
00618 
00619     CString listItemText;
00620     CString searchText = mSearchText;
00621 
00622     searchText.MakeLower();    //don't want to edit the text entered
00623     if( searchText != _T("") )
00624         {
00625         mPacketListBox.setSearchString( searchText );
00626         int nextIndex;
00627         switch( mSearchDirection )
00628             {
00629             case SEARCH_UP: //up selected
00630                 {
00631                 for(nextIndex = selectedIndex - 1; nextIndex != selectedIndex; nextIndex-- )
00632                     {
00633                     if( nextIndex < 0 )
00634                     {
00635                         nextIndex = mPacketListBox.GetCount() - 1;  //count is not zero-based
00636                     }
00637                     mPacketListBox.GetText( nextIndex, listItemText );
00638                     listItemText.MakeLower();
00639                     if( listItemText.Find( searchText, 0 ) != -1 )
00640                         {
00641                         mPacketListBox.SetCurSel( nextIndex );
00642                         OnLbnSelchangeLog();    //update packet info window
00643                         break;
00644                         }
00645                     }
00646                 break;
00647                 }
00648             case SEARCH_DOWN: //down selected
00649                 {
00650                 for( nextIndex = selectedIndex + 1; nextIndex != selectedIndex; nextIndex++ )
00651                     {
00652                     if( nextIndex >= mPacketListBox.GetCount() )
00653                         {
00654                         nextIndex = 0;
00655                         if (nextIndex == selectedIndex )
00656                             break; //have to check condition since we are changing in middle
00657                         }
00658                     mPacketListBox.GetText( nextIndex, listItemText );
00659                     listItemText.MakeLower();
00660                     if( listItemText.Find( searchText, 0 ) != -1 )
00661                         {
00662                         mPacketListBox.SetCurSel( nextIndex );
00663                         OnLbnSelchangeLog();    //update packet info window
00664                         break;
00665                         }
00666                     }
00667                 break;
00668                 }
00669             default:
00670                 return;
00671             }
00672         if( nextIndex == selectedIndex )    //either not found at all, or index highlighted is the only one
00673             {
00674             mPacketListBox.GetText( selectedIndex, listItemText );
00675             listItemText.MakeLower();
00676             CString error;
00677             if( listItemText.Find( searchText, 0 ) != -1 ) //no more occurrences of this
00678                 {
00679                 error.Format( _T("No more occurrences of '%s' were found"), mSearchText );
00680                 }
00681             else                                    //not found at all
00682                 {
00683                 error.Format( _T("'%s' was not found "), mSearchText );
00684                 }
00685             MessageBox( error, _T("End of Search") );
00686             }
00687         }
00688     else
00689         {
00690         mPacketListBox.setSearchString( _T("") );
00691         MessageBox( _T("Search box is empty"), _T("Unable to search") );
00692         }
00693     mPacketListBox.RedrawWindow( 0, 0, RDW_FRAME|RDW_INVALIDATE|RDW_UPDATENOW|RDW_ERASE );
00694 }
Generated on Thu May 5 2011 15:43:38 for Garmin Fleet Management Controller by  1.7.1
